kpi.name: M8014C16

kpi_info.title: Failed Inter eNB S1-Handover preparations due to target eNB admission control
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Inter eNB S1-based Handover preparations with cause "No Radio Resources Available in Target Cell". UPDATED: This counter is updated following the reception of an S1AP: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE message from MME to source eNB with cause "No Radio Resources Available in Target Cell" if this message is received in response to the preparation of an Inter eNB Handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Inter eNB S1-Handover preparations due to target eNB admission control
